articles.title: B'luru: Cop’s 150 paintings on jewel beetle to be exhibited
articles.description: A sight he witnessed seven years ago when he visited his village in Magadi taluk has inspired this policeman to come up with 150 paintings. On Saturday, he will host his first solo painting exhibition in the city, which he calls a dream come true.
